sentences.text: Welcome! I'm a chubbyy named Chubbyy. Tap here.
Hi. I just got you from the App Store. [Tap here to respond]
Good work. It feels great to get out of those screenshots and onto your phone. You're the first family I've had. Do you have a last name?
I do. My full name is Willard Rumpus, so you can be Chubbyy #{last_name}.
You just need to know three things to take care of a chubbyy
No chubbyy lives forever, so make sure I eat good stuff that isn't gross.
I live inside of this app. I can talk, but only from inside here, so sometimes I get lonely. I'd feel better if I could get your attention.

sentences.skip: Don't worry, I'll remember to check on you.

sentences.text: I have a few spots on the screen for you to tap.
I love hearts. I absorb hearts like water. I can never have too many. Go ahead, tap the heart.
I also need to eat. That circle down there is where you can feed me.
Mmmm. That fat tube is my guts. If I don't eat correctly my guts could explode.
